text: Hey all! At Mailbird one of our main buyer personas is people over the age of 65. I was just wondering if other folks here are targeting this age group as well. Let's chat! I'd love to talk about the different opportunities and barriers you've come across. Also, if there are any specific content strategies you've adopted. I would also be open to a quick call sometime if that's easier. Cheers!
